attributes.action: Change Key features of digital terrestrial telelvision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This involves removing unwanted timeshift channels from the DVB-T platform and preferabbly also pay DVB-T services. Also we would like the analogue spectrum to be used for dvb-t SD and HD signals when analogoue channels are to be stopped broadcasting. 
The main issue is that we want a controller for the DVB-T platform, that will control the type of channels that broadcast improving the quality of the service.
